body_text:
Why do anime and manga use the same faces? 

Many shows use the same face template throughout.  Why do they use this?

Why did Yoshihiro Togashi recycle designs from yu yu hakusho for his characters in hunter x hunter? 
Although Gon's not similar by facial design he is similar by green schemes that yusuke has and hair color is similar

Killua is similar from hiei's demeanor

Both have androgynous appearances

Personalities are similar
